first.text: ! I am Dasha from Capgemini pvt ltd. We are currently hiring people for various profiles and I am looking forward for knowing about you, are you okay for some questions?

repeat.text: I was just saying, can you hear me

first.text: Perfect, thank you. First question - What is the role are you looking for?

repeat.text: I was just saying, What is the role are you looking for?

first.text: Perfect. Second question - How much experience do you have?

repeat.text: I was just saying, How much experience do you have?

first.text: Okay. Third question is, What type of employment are you looking for? Examples are, full time, part time

repeat.text: I was just saying, What type of employment are you looking for? Examples are, full time, part time?

first.text: I see. Next question is, What are your key skills?

repeat.text: I was just saying, What are your key skills?

first.text: Thanks for being patient and answering all questions, we will get back to you within 7 days. Bye for now!
Great! And I can hear you too. Bye!
Great! I will call you back. Bye!
You will excuse me if I find that highly unlikely. After all, you responded to me and I can hear you just fine. Peace out!

i_will_call_back.text: Okay, I'll call you later. Bye!

when_callback.text: When can I call you back?

random.text: Sorry, could you say it again?
Sorry, the connection dropped for a second. Could you say that again?
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that.
Could you say it one more time?

dont_understand_request.text: Sorry, i cant do it now. May be some day.

dont_understand_question.text: Sorry, i dont understand your question. Can you say it otherwise?

dont_understand_hangup.text: I'm sorry I can barely hear you. I'll try to call you later! Bye!

dont_understand_forward.text: I'm sorry, let me transfer you to another agent. Please stand by!

yes_i_am_a_robot.text: Actually I am an advanced AI. Just don't tell my boss or I'll be out of a job.

repeat_question.text: Can you repeat the question, please?
